item.description: On Thursday, April 7, starting at 7:15p, The Disproof Atheism Society will present “Objectivist Perspectives on Atheism,” an open and critical discussion, based in part on http://meinwords.wordpress.com/2009/09/27/why-an-immortal-god-cannot-value-and-therefore-cannot-love-or-know-purpose. Location: Rm. 442 of the BU Photonics Center, 8 St. Mary’s St., Boston. Free & open to the public. More info: DASociety@aol.com.
item.why: thoughtful and critical discussion is of general benefit.
item.name: The Disproof Atheism Society presents "Objectivist Perspectives on Atheism"
